Lesson 4 - WAP

Expected Work

  1. Get most of Solution Stack installed
  2. Continue reading Web Design Theory, get to Photoshop
  3. Get your UI iterations as concrete as possible including widths, heights, colours, images, positioning, offsets, font choices.
  4. Do more UI iterations for secondary and tertiary pages. Think about user workflow.
  5. Continue research on your technology stack

Agile

  1. What have you done since yesterday?
  2. What are you planning to do today?
  3. Any impediments/stumbling blocks?

Lecture

  1. Talk about Solution Stack if necessary
  2. Design Theory User Experience (include custom fonts with fontsquirrel)
  3. Photoshop beginning
  4. 52 days left!

Practice

  1. Research on the technology stack
  2. Complete your UI iterations while incorporating user experience, user interface understanding and wireframing practices
  3. Work through the solution stack installing everything
  4. Install photoshop trial version

End Lecture

  1. Blog creation
